hero.title: Next-Gen Roblox Development Experience
hero.subtitle: Experience high-quality game development on Roblox. Professional scripting, reliable systems, and completely customized to your vision.

about.intro: I'm DevSnipahh, a dedicated Roblox developer known for creating robust game systems using Lua/LuaU for frontend gameplay and Python for backend infrastructure and automation.
about.experience: My unique approach combines in-game Roblox scripting with external Python services, enabling advanced features like real-time analytics, automated moderation, and cross-platform integrations.
about.commitment: I deliver production-ready code that scales with your game's growth, backed by comprehensive documentation and ongoing support.

skills.description: Efficient data handling, player save systems, and cross-server communication.
